de.weltraumschaf.commons.application

Interface IO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IOStreams

    public interface IO
    Implementations provide an aggregate object which contains STDIN, STDOUT and STDERR streams.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
